title: Khloe Kardashian shares photo of 'sweetest tribe' of cousins True, North and Penelope bonding
text:
The Kardashian sisters are known for being incredibly tight.

So its no surprise that their daughters have become quite close as well.

Youngest sister, Khloe Kardashian took to social media on Sunday to share a sweet shot of her daughter True Thompson, one, and cousins North West, six, and Penelope, seven.

Scroll down for video

'The sweetest tribe': Khloe Kardashian shared an adorable photo of cousins True, North and Penelope bonding on Sunday morning

'The sweetest little tribe,' she captioned.

Kourtney's daughter, Penelope, was seated on the far left wearing a light singlet top in the photo.

Kim's eldest child, North, sat in the middle holding up True with her hair in two braids.

Cousins: Penelope and True spent much of Saturday together bonding

Sisters: The Kardashian sisters are known for being incredibly tight. So its no surprise that their daughters have become quite close as well

Khloe's picture comes after she spent Saturday with Kourtney and Penelope.

Videos saw the middle child of Scott Disick driving True around in her mini electric car.

And it appears as though the little one really loved her elder cousins' company, with True seen searching for and calling out 'P' in a sweet video.

Driving around: Khloe's picture comes after she spent Saturday with Kourtney and Penelope. Videos saw the middle child of Scott Disick driving True around in her mini electric car

Pricey! The small convertible toy car is made by Supersports and retails for $350

Kourtney also captured sweet moments on her social media, with her daughter video taped driving with her iPad in the passenger seat.

'No texting and driving,' she joked.

The small convertible toy car is made by Supersports and retails for $350.

The toy is a scale replica of luxury car with all of the authentic logos and lights, real rubber tires , a working suspension and an MP3 input port on the dash.

It also has a remote control so parents can redirect their little ones if they go off track.
description: Khloe Kardashian shared an adorable photo of cousins True, North and Penelope bonding on Sunday morning. Khloe captioned the photo 'the sweetest tribe.'
